verses.verse: וַעֲזַרְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH5838> came upon Azariah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עוֹדֵ֔ד <WH5752> of Oded הָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> came עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> now ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> And the Spirit אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וַיֵּצֵא֮ <WH3318> And he went out לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> to meet אָסָא֒ <WH609> Asa וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said ל֔וֹ שְׁמָע֕וּנִי <WH8085> unto him Hear אָסָ֖א <WH609> ye me Asa וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יְהוּדָ֣ה <WH3063> and all Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> and Benjamin יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> The LORD עִמָּכֶם֙ <WH5973> with בִּֽהְיֽוֹתְכֶ֣ם <WH1961> become עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with וְאִֽם־ <WH518> and if תִּדְרְשֻׁ֙הוּ֙ <WH1875> [is] with you while ye be with him and if ye seek יִמָּצֵ֣א <WH4672> him he will be found לָכֶ֔ם וְאִם־ <WH518> if תַּעַזְבֻ֖הוּ <WH5800> of you but if ye forsake יַעֲזֹ֥ב <WH5800> him he will forsake אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853> ס

וְיָמִ֥ים <WH3117> season רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> Now for a long לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel לְלֹ֣א ׀ <WH3808> [hath been] without אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God אֱמֶ֗ת <WH571> the true וּלְלֹ֛א <WH3808> and without כֹּהֵ֥ן <WH3548> priest מוֹרֶ֖ה <WH3384> and without a teaching וּלְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and without תוֹרָֽה׃ <WH8451> and without law

וַיָּ֙שָׁב֙ <WH7725> did turn בַּצַּר־ <WH6862> But when they in their trouble ל֔וֹ עַל־ <WH5921> unto יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיְבַקְשֻׁ֖הוּ <WH1245> and sought וַיִּמָּצֵ֥א <WH4672> him he was found לָהֶֽם׃

וּבָעִתִּ֣ים <WH6251> flock הָהֵ֔ם <WH1992> those אֵ֥ין <WH369> there שָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> [there was] no peace לַיּוֹצֵ֣א <WH3318> to him that went out וְלַבָּ֑א <WH935> nor to him that came in כִּ֚י <WH3588> for מְהוּמֹ֣ת <WH4103> vexations רַבּ֔וֹת <WH7227> but great עַ֥ל <WH5921> afflicted כָּל־ <WH3605> all יוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> [were] upon all the inhabitants הָאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <WH776> of the countries

וְכֻתְּת֥וּ <WH3807> was destroyed גוֹי־ <WH1471> And nation בְּג֖וֹי <WH1471> of nation וְעִ֣יר <WH5892> and city בְּעִ֑יר <WH5892> of city כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> for God הֲמָמָ֖ם <WH2000> did vex בְּכָל־ <WH3605> every צָרָֽה׃ <WH6869> them with all adversity

וְאַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you חִזְק֔וּ <WH2388> Be ye strong וְאַל־ <WH408> nay יִרְפּ֖וּ <WH7503> be weak יְדֵיכֶ֑ם <WH3027> therefore and let not your hands כִּ֛י <WH3588> for יֵ֥שׁ <WH3426> shall be שָׂכָ֖ר <WH7939> rewarded לִפְעֻלַּתְכֶֽם׃ <WH6468> for your work ס

וְכִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <WH8085> heard אָסָ֜א <WH609> And when Asa הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> these words הָאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> these וְהַנְּבוּאָה֮ <WH5016> and the prophecy עֹדֵ֣ד <WH5752> of Oded הַנָּבִיא֒ <WH5030> the prophet הִתְחַזַּ֗ק <WH2388> he took courage וַיַּעֲבֵ֤ר <WH5674> and put away הַשִּׁקּוּצִים֙ <WH8251> the abominable idols מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> out of all the land יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> and Benjamin וּמִן־ <WH4480> and from הֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <WH5892> and out of the cities אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לָכַ֖ד <WH3920> which he had taken מֵהַ֣ר <WH2022> from mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> Ephraim וַיְחַדֵּשׁ֙ <WH2318> and renewed אֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> the altar יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֕ר <WH834> which לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> that [was] before אוּלָ֥ם <WH197> the porch יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיִּקְבֹּ֗ץ <WH6908> And he gathered אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> all Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> and Benjamin וְהַגָּרִים֙ <WH1481> and the strangers עִמָּהֶ֔ם <WH5973> from מֵאֶפְרַ֥יִם <WH669> with them out of Ephraim וּמְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> and Manasseh וּמִשִּׁמְע֑וֹן <WH8095> and out of Simeon כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נָפְל֨וּ <WH5307> for they fell עָלָ֤יו <WH5921> unto מִיִּשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> to him out of Israel לָרֹ֔ב <WH7230> in abundance בִּרְאֹתָ֕ם <WH7200> when they saw כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֱלֹהָ֖יו <WH430> his God עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with פ

וַיִּקָּבְצ֥וּ <WH6908> So they gathered themselves together יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> at Jerusalem בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <WH7992> in the third לִשְׁנַ֥ת <WH8141> year חֲמֵשׁ־ <WH2568> fif עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> teen לְמַלְכ֥וּת <WH4438> of the reign אָסָֽא׃ <WH609> of Asa

וַיִּזְבְּח֤וּ <WH2076> And they offered לַיהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> the same time הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁלָ֖ל <WH7998> of the spoil הֵבִ֑יאוּ <WH935> [which] they had brought בָּקָר֙ <WH1241> oxen שְׁבַ֣ע <WH7651> seven מֵא֔וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְצֹ֖אן <WH6629> sheep שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> and seven אֲלָפִֽים׃ <WH505> thousand

וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> And they entered בַבְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> into a covenant לִדְר֕וֹשׁ <WH1875> to seek אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God אֲבוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לְבָבָ֖ם <WH3824> with all their heart וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all נַפְשָֽׁם׃ <WH5315> and with all their soul

וְכֹ֨ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִדְרֹ֛שׁ <WH1875> That whosoever would not seek לַיהוָ֥ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel יוּמָ֑ת <WH4191> should be put to death לְמִן־ <WH4480> whether קָטֹן֙ <WH6996> small וְעַד־ <WH5704> or גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> or great לְמֵאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> whether man וְעַד־ <WH5704> or אִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> or woman

וַיִּשָּֽׁבְעוּ֙ <WH7650> And they sware לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD בְּק֥וֹל <WH6963> voice גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> with a loud וּבִתְרוּעָ֑ה <WH8643> and with shouting וּבַחֲצֹצְר֖וֹת <WH2689> and with trumpets וּבְשׁוֹפָרֽוֹת׃ <WH7782> and with cornets

וַיִּשְׂמְח֨וּ <WH8055> rejoiced כָל־ <WH3605> All יְהוּדָ֜ה <WH3063> And all Judah עַל־ <WH5921> concerning הַשְּׁבוּעָ֗ה <WH7621> at the oath כִּ֤י <WH3588> with בְכָל־ <WH3605> their whole לְבָבָם֙ <WH3824> with all their heart נִשְׁבָּ֔עוּ <WH7650> for they had sworn וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> their whole רְצוֹנָ֣ם <WH7522> him with their whole desire בִּקְשֻׁ֔הוּ <WH1245> and sought וַיִּמָּצֵ֖א <WH4672> and he was found לָהֶ֑ם וַיָּ֧נַח <WH5117> gave them rest יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of them and the LORD לָהֶ֖ם מִסָּבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

וְגַֽם־ <WH1571> also מַעֲכָ֞ה <WH4601> And also [concerning] Maachah אֵ֣ם ׀ <WH517> the mother אָסָ֣א <WH609> of Asa הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> the king הֱסִירָהּ֙ <WH5493> he removed מִגְּבִירָ֔ה <WH1377> her from [being] queen אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> because עָשְׂתָ֥ה <WH6213> because she had made לַאֲשֵׁרָ֖ה <WH842> in a grove מִפְלָ֑צֶת <WH4656> an idol וַיִּכְרֹ֤ת <WH3772> cut down אָסָא֙ <WH609> and Asa אֶת־ <WH853> מִפְלַצְתָּ֔הּ <WH4656> her idol וַיָּ֕דֶק <WH1854> and stamped וַיִּשְׂרֹ֖ף <WH8313> [it] and burnt בְּנַ֥חַל <WH5158> [it] at the brook קִדְרֽוֹן׃ <WH6939> Kidron

וְהַ֨בָּמ֔וֹת <WH1116> But the high places לֹא־ <WH3808> were not סָ֖רוּ <WH5493> were not taken away מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> out of Israel רַ֧ק <WH7535> but לְבַב־ <WH3824> nevertheless the heart אָסָ֛א <WH609> of Asa הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become שָׁלֵ֖ם <WH8003> was perfect כָּל־ <WH3605> all יָמָֽיו׃ <WH3117> all his days

וַיָּבֵ֞א <WH935> And he brought אֶת־ <WH853> קָדְשֵׁ֥י <WH6944> had dedicated אָבִ֛יו <WH1> the things that his father וְקָֽדָשָׁ֖יו <WH6942> into בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> into the house הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God כֶּ֥סֶף <WH3701> silver וְזָהָ֖ב <WH2091> and gold וְכֵלִֽים׃ <WH3627> and vessels

וּמִלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> And there was no [more] war לֹ֣א <WH3808> no הָיָ֑תָה <WH1961> become עַ֛ד <WH5704> until שְׁנַת־ <WH8141> year שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> and thirtieth וְחָמֵ֖שׁ <WH2568> unto the five לְמַלְכ֥וּת <WH4438> of the reign אָסָֽא׃ <WH609> of Asa ס
